_comment_settings: Settings used by the executable: lib path, log configuration

exeSettings._comment_useAudioVideo: True if Medias (Audio / Video) are used
exeSettings._comment_ffmpegLibFolderPath: (OPTIONAL) Valid to FFMpeg libraries - only if you need it
exeSettings._comment_logFolderPath: Folder path where logs wile be stored
exeSettings._comment_s2sCallbackURL: (OPTIONAL) Specify the S2S callback url - only if you need it
exeSettings._comment_cultureInfo: (OPTIONAL) Specify Culture Info to use (let null / empty to use default one) - see https://learn.microsoft.com/fr-fr/dotnet/api/system.globalization.cultureinfo.getcultureinfo
